publ: by Jasco Products - In Wall Smart Dimmer
name: PHILIPSSmartSelect
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have any questions about using this skill, contact our U.S.-based consumer care at support@byjasco.com.

Enjoy voice command of your home through Alexa compatible Echo products. Simply ask Alexa to turn on or turn off.
To connect PHILIPS SmartSelect Wi-Fi devices to Alexa:
(1). Download the PHILIPS app from the Android or iOS app market
(2). Create an account in the PHILIPS app
(3). Install your Wi-Fi device following the instructions provided with your device
(4). Follow the on-screen prompts to pair the device with the PHILIPS app
(5). Change the name of the device, which identifies the device in the skill
(6). Download Amazon Alexa app from the Amazon, Android or iOS app market
(7). Configure your Echo with the Alexa app
(8). Search " PHILIPS SmartSelect" in the Alexa app skills category
(9). Click “enable to use”
(10). When redirected to the PHILIPS SmartSelect login page, enter your PHILIPS app account information

You can enjoy voice control on your home devices such as:
“Alexa, turn on lamp 1"
“Alexa, turn off lamp 1"

“Alexa, turn on lamp 2"
“Alexa, turn off lamp 2"

“Alexa, turn on lamp 3"
“Alexa, turn off lamp 3"

The PHILIPS SmartSelect skill supports the following products:
• PHILIPS 6-Outlet Surge Protector
• PHILIPS 3-Outlet Extension Cord with 3 Wi-Fi Outlets
• PHILIPS 4-Outlet Wi-Fi Tap
